scripts.docker:build-compile: export PROJECT=$(echo ${npm_package_name} | cut -d "/" -f2) && docker buildx build --target compile-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --build-arg PROXY=$(jq -r .proxy package.json) -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:compile .
scripts.docker:build-runtime: export PROJECT=$(echo ${npm_package_name} | cut -d "/" -f2) && docker buildx build --target runtime-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --build-arg PROXY=$(jq -r .proxy package.json) --build-arg PORT=$(jq -r .port package.json) -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:latest .
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build-compile -s && npm run docker:build-runtime -s && npm run docker:push -s
